reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Leveraging Global Fund’s RSSH investments in DRC to contribute to the attainment of universal health coverage (UHC) and other health-related targets of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

description.narrative: Congo (Democratic Republic) - RSSH - Ministry of Health of the Democratic Republic of Congo - MOH. This program has the following goals: Contribuer au bien-être de la population congolaise d’ici 2022 dans le cadre de la couverture sanitaire universelle et des autres cibles des objectifs de développement durable (ODD) / Contribute to the well-being of the Congolese population by 2022 as part of universal health coverage and other targets of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).. The objectives of this program are: Axe stratégique 1 : Amélioration des prestations des services de santé et continuité des soins / Strategic focus 1: Improving health service delivery and continuity of care.. Axe stratégique 2 : Appui aux piliers du système de santé pour améliorer la disponibilité et l’accessibilité de soins de qualité / Strategic focus 2: Support for the pillars of the health system to improve the availability and accessibility of quality care.. Axe stratégique 3 : Appui à la gouvernance, au leadership et au pilotage du système de santé / Strategic focus 3: Support for governance, leadership and management of the health system.

title.narrative: Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Percent of district health management teams or other administrative units that have developed a monitoring plan, including annual work objectives and performance measures

M & E- other 2: Promptness of logistics reports from health facilities: Percentage of monthly logistics information reports expected from facilities (for the reporting period) that were received within 20 days after the end of the month
Percentage of community based monitoring reports presented to relevant oversight mechanisms
SD other-1: Percentage of supervision pools that carried out quality supervision (according to standards and guidelines) during the year

M & E-other 1: Completeness of logistics reports from health facilities: Percentage of monthly logistics information reports expected from facilities (for the reporting period) that have actually been received
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
HRH-other 1: Percentage of health workers benefiting from incentive bonus on time out of the expected number
Percentage of facilities that receive supportive supervision – at least once per quarter
